name: StarPug: Space dogs II
description:
Starpug is a game made for #UOGBJAM and is inspired by Starfox.

Taking the role of a starship gunner, the player follows Starpug into an action-packed journey to save the aniverse!

Created in around 5 days and featuring music by @BibikiGL, I tried to play around with the idea of what super fx style graphics could look like on the Gameboy.

Controls

Mouse - Look around

left click - fire!

Please do leave feedback as I will revisit this project soon.
